QuestData.Title: How To Stop An Exploding Toy Boat
QuestData.Description:
I am loathe to part a child from their toy, but it would be a great value to the Kirin Tor to study how it absorbed so much arcana.
Then again... I do not want to slight our new tuskarr allies. I do have a wand that could dispel the magic...
Let's speak with Toolk's mother, then decide what to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Toolk's mother, then recover the toy boat.
QuestData.RewardText: We did the right thing today. There will be more magical oddities to research, but this girl will not get more gifts from her lost father.

Objectives.Objective: Arcane magic dispelled from toy boat
